name: Ditsy Diner
description:
dont drop the food 

Download Unzip and run the ditsydiner.exe 

This was made by a couple team in 3 days where you play as a 50s diner maid serving crazy hooverbots if they dont get there food on time you dont get paid. 

there might be a little secret if you can get to over 400 point. but dont try 1000 :)
